name: Glass Masquerade
description: Welcome to Glass Masquerade - an artistic puzzle game inspired by Art Deco & stained glass artisans of the 20th century. You need to combine hidden glass pieces to unveil clocks and themes exhibited by various cultures of the world at the 'International Times Exhibition' - an interactive electronic show.

recommended_requirements: 推奨: OS: Windows 7 (or higher) プロセッサー: 2.0GHz CPU or higher メモリー: 2 GB RAM グラフィック: Nvidia GTX 650, AMD HD7850 (or higher), 1GB video memory ストレージ: 500 MB 利用可能

reviews.review_text: Decent game. The artwork and the music were beautiful. The length of the title was fine as well. I was hoping to see multiple puzzles for each country but they stuck with one per country. The price vs length of the game is about appropriate. Decent four hour gaming session with little to no distractions. Some of the levels were ranked 4/5 stars difficulty but they should have been 2/5. The difficulty the devs assigned to the levels don't seem accurate. Other than that I couldn't find anything wrong with it. Devs need to come out with more puzzle games or even add more content into this one.
great little puzzle game, with good graphics and game play.
